document_data.caption: The badge of the Trail Lords.
document_data.name: Trail Lords
document_data.mainbody: The '''Trail Lords''' were a merchant company in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.History: In the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]], this mysterious merchant group was known to hire [[half-orcs]], and other unsavory races, as caravan guards. The group was rumored to be composed of wealthy merchant-kings who fell under the control of [[Thay]].
